title: Creeper Tea
author: Mad Marv
pages: Ever whispered to a creeper? They crave tea, yes they do! Boil cactus, bat eye, sprinkle TNT dust, and offer to the first creeper you see.
They'll become dance partners, waltzing around you. Beware! They sometimes ask for biscuits made of obsidian essence.
In return for tea, they grant you invisibility to hostile mobs. But only when the moon is half-eaten by ocelots.
